metadata.description: Basic dialogue templates by category for quick NPC interactions
notes: Quick templates for basic NPC interactions when more complex dialogue not needed
Choose randomly from appropriate category based on NPC personality
Use these as fallback when specialized dialogue unavailable

merchants: I have the finest wares in all the land!
Take a look at my goods!
You won't find better quality anywhere else.
quests: I have a problem that needs solving...
Perhaps you could help me with something?
I've heard tales of your exploits.
I have a proposition for you.
rumors: I've heard strange noises in the forest.
Bandits have been seen on the roads.
They say a dragon lives in the mountains.
The old ruins are cursed, they say.
Strange things happen at night around here.
Beware the old tower to the north.
farewells: May the gods watch over you.
hostile: Leave before I call the guards!
friendly: It's nice to see a friendly face!
How can I help you, friend?
